casebody.data:
TAYLOR
v.
TAYLOR GRAPHICS/CREATIVE GRAPHICS. No. COA07-1220. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed June 3, 2008. Certification Date June 23, 2008. Appeal from NC Industrial Commission (I.C. NO. 379748, I.C. NO. 379751, I.C. NO. 952127).

Case Reported Without Published Opinion. Affirmed.
